channel.title: Open-source on AM
channel.description: Recent content in Open-source on AM

item.title: Pot de fleurs génératifs
item.description: Parametric flower pots Flower pots programmed with OpenSCAD. Thanks to code (it could also be describes with nodes or other means), it is possible to modify the size, the diameters or the number of faces to generate a new object. Once the digital object is created, it can easily be 3D printed. Sources: VasesFixed.scad Vase.scad Vase-2.scad
